name: Colora (The Red Unicorn)
description: How long can you dodge the missiles for?  Try to survive as long as possible, setting high scores and dodging with style! Avoid negative powerups that try to deter your streak, while getting good powerups to empower your rocket! Made with the Ventura Game Engine. NOTICE: The game was developed using a 1920x1080 moniter; if your monitor does not match this dimesions the UI will be offset.
